languages.text: {n}Победно улыбнувшись ответному кличу своих солдат, Комиссар вполголоса добавляет:{/n} "Ну как можно избавиться от столь вдохновляющего пленника. Ребята не поймут".

{n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."
languages.original_text: {n}Победно улыбнувшись ответному кличу своих солдат, Комиссар вполголоса добавляет:{/n} "Ну как можно избавиться от столь вдохновляющего пленника. Ребята не поймут".

traits.locale_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}士兵们异口同声，给出了一致的回答。政委对他们露出了胜利的微笑，随后压低声音，补充道。{/n}“这位囚徒是如此鼓舞人心，我怎么会放他走呢？要是真的放了他，士气恐怕就要一落千丈了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."

traits.locale_text: {n}士兵们异口同声，给出了一致的回答。政委对他们露出了胜利的微笑，随后压低声音，补充道。{/n}“这位囚徒是如此鼓舞人心，我怎么会放他走呢？要是真的放了他，士气恐怕就要一落千丈了。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}兵士たちの異口同音の反応に誇らしげに微笑みながら、コミッサーを小さい声で付け加えた。{/n}「兵士たちの士気をあげる素晴らしい捕虜を手放すわけがないでしょう。レジスタンスの仲間に顔向けできません」
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."

traits.locale_text: {n}兵士たちの異口同音の反応に誇らしげに微笑みながら、コミッサーを小さい声で付け加えた。{/n}「兵士たちの士気をあげる素晴らしい捕虜を手放すわけがないでしょう。レジスタンスの仲間に顔向けできません」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Con una sonrisa triunfal ante la respuesta unánime de sus soldados, el Comisario añade en voz baja:{/n} «No puedo dejar escapar a rehenes de esa talla. Mis camaradas de la resistencia se lo tomarían muy mal».
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una sonrisa triunfal ante la respuesta unánime de sus soldados, el Comisario añade en voz baja:{/n} «No puedo dejar escapar a rehenes de esa talla. Mis camaradas de la resistencia se lo tomarían muy mal».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."

languages.text: {n}Ravi de la réaction unanime de ses soldats, le commissaire, un sourire triomphant aux lèvres, poursuit sur un ton plus modéré :{/n} « Comment pourrais-je laisser partir un prisonnier qui inspire tant de choses à mes camarades ? Ça leur briserait le cœur, les pauvres. »
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravi de la réaction unanime de ses soldats, le commissaire, un sourire triomphant aux lèvres, poursuit sur un ton plus modéré :{/n} « Comment pourrais-je laisser partir un prisonnier qui inspire tant de choses à mes camarades ? Ça leur briserait le cœur, les pauvres. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Nach einem triumphierenden Lächeln angesichts der einhelligen Reaktion der Soldaten fügt der Kommissar mit gesenkter Stimme hinzu:{/n} "Wie könnte ich einen so inspirierenden Gefangenen gehen lassen? Meine Kameraden im Widerstand wären todunglücklich."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einem triumphierenden Lächeln angesichts der einhelligen Reaktion der Soldaten fügt der Kommissar mit gesenkter Stimme hinzu:{/n} "Wie könnte ich einen so inspirierenden Gefangenen gehen lassen? Meine Kameraden im Widerstand wären todunglücklich."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Askerlerinin hep bir ağızdan verdikleri yanıt karşısında zaferle gülümseyen Komiser, sesini alçaltarak ekliyor.{/n} "Böylesi ilham verici bir mahkûmu nasıl elimden çıkarabilirim? Direniş savaşçısı dostlarım mahvolur."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling triumphantly at his soldiers' unanimous response, the Commissar adds in a lowered voice,{/n} "How can I let such an inspiring prisoner go? My fellow resistance fighters would be devastated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Askerlerinin hep bir ağızdan verdikleri yanıt karşısında zaferle gülümseyen Komiser, sesini alçaltarak ekliyor:{/n} "Böylesi ilham verici bir mahkûmu nasıl elimden çıkarabilirim? Direniş savaşçısı dostlarım mahvolur."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
